title: Former EastEnders star Katie Jarvis is a B&M security guard after soap star role
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Former EastEnder Katie Jarvis has a new role – as a security guard in a B&M store.

Her popular character, Hayley Slater, mysteriously left Albert Square in February with a source later confirming there were no plans for her to return.

Fans were scratching their heads as she had been at the heart of the soap’s big Christmas storyline.

But we can reveal Katie, 28, has a job at a B&M discount store in Romford, East London.

The mum of two, who patrols the store in an all-black uniform, said: “I’ve taken a step back from acting. I’ve got a job and I'm looking after my kids.”

Bosses at the BBC soap signed Katie, from Dagenham, in early 2018.

Last Christmas, her character was revealed to be having a fling with cousin Kat’s husband Alfie Moon.

Alfie, played by Shane Richie, was the father of her baby.

But Katie was last seen when that storyline came to an end.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

A source said: “People have been wondering where Hayley is. But the mystery has been solved – she’s in Romford at B&M.

“There was so much speculation about her departure but there was no reason to keep her ­character in Albert Square once the storyline ended.”

Earlier this year, the former TV soap star was glassed in a vicious attack .

She was treated by medics after the assault.

She said: “Big thank you to the Met police tonight and ambulance service for looking after me after I was glassed by a drunken Irish man for f*** all.”

It is believed Katie was out in Romford, East London, when she was set upon on a Friday night last March.

She later deleted the tweet.

But not before concerned fans of the actress spotted it and frantically inquired as to her wellbeing.
description: People have been wondering where Hayley Slater is. But the mystery has been solved – she’s in Romford's B&M store, working as a security guard
